title: Who’s your guilty pleasure champ?
body: Tryndamere. It’s... kind of funny just how Tryndamere operates, compared to other champs. You do all these acrobatic stuff, and here he is just using basic attacks to cave in your face.

replies.body:
Malzahar
Its not about having fun, its about not allowing that Zed/Yasuo/whatever to have fun

People would hate me, but {{champion:555}} is just to fun, maybe to much for my own liking... No one can outrun their inevitable death... even me...
But he cannot match the precision {{champion:202}} offers. The sweet feel of killing someone with just 2 or 3 auto attacks never kills my satisfaction. Never get bored playing Jhin, no matter the situation...
I have a few more, but my comment will be too long...

>The sweet feel of killing someone with just 2 or 3 auto attacks never kills my satisfaction.

If you kill someone as Jhin with any number of auto attacks except 4, you are playing him wrong.
Been playing him a fair bit too and i agree. Him, and top-lane bard.

Top lane bard.

That sounds like a good campfire story.

> [{quoted}](name=The entire team,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2klj0iEe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-07-16T20:46:04.273+0000)
>
> Top lane bard.
> 
> That sounds like a good campfire story.

So there I was, sittin with my sword out, ready to despence JUSTICE to the villians, when out of no where I here it... ding ding...   I spin around, and around, and when im done, im stuck to a wall, and all I see is this small peg leg dissapear into the hillside...  and my minions? All of them had vanished... all left to little sounds of ding... ding...  *shudders*
Mid lane Janna. I hate assassins, so I pick the most anti-assassin champ possible.

Lee Sin

I have a sub 40% wr on him but keep playing him when I get jungle even though im much better on Vi or Ivern (dont ask about the tree.)

{{champion:12}} If I am playing Support and can depend on my ADC to harass and farm by themselves. It's like playing pre-rework Taric, except I only have to press buttons when I need to peel or engage.
{{champion:76}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:76}}  So much that I've reached half a million pts with this main.

Want to see mobile ADCs rage quit in bot lane? {{champion:78}} Support. Tackle to a wall and right as it wears off press W, god help them if the no flash changes go through PBE
Want to make the jungler never go bot after level 6? Just Ult as {{champion:78}} Support, they will never bother unless they know ult is on CD
Contesting drag is a problem? No worries, youre support so you are always nearby to ult away the enemy team as drag is going down

Good times. Good times.
{{champion:9}} i play a mean fiddle. cant wait for his rework
I really enjoy seeing how much health I can get in a game on Cho.  I like to drag out games on him attempting to use my ult on cooldown the entire game.  So far my record is 8623 HP with 18 stacks.
